name: New Tricks
description:
A puppy and an old dog have gotten lost and can't find their way home. That's ruff! Use the old dog's nose to find the clues, and the puppy's boundless energy to collect them. Once you have all 4, you can sniff to get home! 

There are also collectables to find, the nutritious snack "Collect-Kibbles"! 

Can you get them all?

Made in a week for the ACM Summer Game Jam.

Hint: The old dog's nose detects nearby clues, sniff everywhere to find them!

Hint 2: Going in and out of the laundrette can be inconsistent, just fiddle with your position and keep clicking!

Hint 3: The old dog is scared of roads! Bark at the traffic light to make it safe for him to cross.

Controls:

Movement: WASD | Camera: Mouse | Click: Bark

Shift: Sprint/Sniff | Space: Jump | Q: Switch Dog

Dog Bark Sounds by Brand Name Audio 

Low Poly Foliage Pack by Emerald Eel Entertainment

Credits: Design, Music & Sound Effects: Kirk Tiller, Aimee-Louise Saunders, Miguel Palma Programming: Kirk Tiller, Miguel Palma 3D Models: Kirk Tiller, Miguel Palma Animations: Kirk Tiller
